headline: NextEra Energy (NEE): Reassessing Valuation After a Recent Pullback and Conflicting Fair Value Signals
summary: What is driving interest in NextEra Energy right now NextEra Energy (NEE) has quietly pulled back about 5% over the past month, even after a 14% gain in the past year. This may be setting up an interesting entry point for patient investors. See our latest analysis for NextEra Energy. That pullback comes after a strong run, with the share price up solidly over the past year and a double digit 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum is cooling, not broken, as investors reassess...
